name: FolorsoftMedia
overview: FolorsoftMedia is a thriving and recognised leading Web Based Marketing and Advertising Company, operating several highly popular shopping portals and a connected network of niche websites. MarkcoMedia generated a huge turnover in sales last year and is forecast to exceed £900 million in 2015, by using our extensive network of web properties, e-mail marketing twice weekly to over 1 million uk subscribers, and by having over 10 million unique visits every month. Our brands include Vouchersbay.co.uk, Vouchersbay.com, Folorsoftmedia.co.uk Folorsoftmedia.com
